Description: "MAGIC POOL PTGHNI" summer house is located in the 8th district of Ptghni, in the back of the famous "Artsiv". It is convenient to hold family gatherings and various events here. The summer house is provided without overnight stay: Check-in time is 11:00, check-out time is 23:00. The total area is 650 square meters, the building area is 220 square meters. It consists of 1 spacious glazed hall, kitchen area, has an indoor pool, 2 toilets and a bathroom with 2 showers. It is completely renovated, provided with all the necessary conditions for entertainment, a gas boiler is installed, it has cooling systems, the floor is covered with heated tiles. Everything is stylishly and comfortably furnished, the kitchen is equipped with necessary furniture and dishes. Bathrooms are tiled and equipped with plumbing fixtures. There is a movie corner, music player, internet connection, cable TV. The pool is heated. The house is fenced, the yard is neat and tidy, paved and has a barbecue grill. Up to 22 people can be accommodated here.Translated from Armenian
